619190.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 16 (Token Pack)
619190.description:
Heroic Characters 16

This token pack contains 36 tokens. This pack contains a variety of characters that can be used as PCs or NPCs.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Female Human Alchemist
  • 2 Female Human Assassins
  • Female Human Cleric
  • Female Human Fighter
  • Female Human Forest Hunter
  • Female Human Jungle Warrior
  • Female Human Mantis Assassin
  • Female Human Pyro Wizard
  • Female Human Tracker
  • 2 Female Human Vampire Hunters
  • Female Human Warrior
  • Female Human Wizard
  • Male Black Knight
  • Male Human Bard Rocker
  • 2 Male Human Clerics
  • Male Human Corrupted Wizard
  • Male Human Duelist
  • Male Human Fighter
  • Male Human Mage
  • 2 Male Human Manga Fighters
  • Male Human Masked Axeman
  • Male Human Orb Holder
  • Male Human Prisoner
  • Male Human Purple Mage
  • Male Human Pyro Wizard
  • Male Human Rage Barbarian
  • Male Human Red Assassin
  • Male Human Rogue
  • Male Human Soldier
  • Male Human Spartan Leader
  • Male Human Thug
  • Male Human Warrior
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
